I've already reviewed this game, however it was a review made while I was probably a little salty and what-have-you. So I deleted that and am trying again. Take what I'm saying as however you like but either way I am someone who paid money and sunk time into the game (Almost 300 hours). 
 Pros - 
- Fairly large playerbase. Depending on your region, it can take a long while to get into a game. Otherwise, it might take a few seconds. 
- It's fun! Sometimes, few and far between. That's obviously the most important part about the game, it can be fun. Take note I said it can be - it isn't always but I'll go over why later. It is fun being a killer (I only have fun as a killer personally unless I'm playing with pals) and raging around with your weapon, chasing people and eventually YEETING that throwing axe into their head and then taking them away to be hanging from the gallows, or rather in the basement. It can be fun to be a survivor and carefully sneak around avoiding being shanked.
- Play who / how you like. Want to be the Killer? You can be the killer. Want to be a survivor? You can be the survivor. You don't have to cross your fingers and hope to be the killer - you just have to choose to be and boom, there you go. Play styles vary among characters and although there are some which are below others, it is your choice to be a sneaky pain-in-the-bollocks or maybe a more high risk, high reward player; boldly attracting the attention of the Killer. And the different Killers play different too, Huntress being lethal and threatening at range whereas the Pig puts pressure on a survivor by giving them a ticking clock until their death. But of course, Ruin is a necessity to slow the game down a lil bit.

Cons - 
- DLC. Of course I should mention this. The DLC Killers are locked behind a pay-wall (not that expensive but nontheless) which can make it seem the game is pay-to-win almost. Or leaving a Killer you think you'd really enjoy tucked away from you. The perks also - some perks from DLC characters do turn the tides of the game significantly, like BBQ+Chilli or Ruin.
- Toxic players. Now, there is a line between a good player and a player that is exploiting bugs, etc and maybe I'm mixing them up here. As a person who plays mostly Killer, you find quite the annoying survivors, understatement of the century. Guaranteed to be at least one in each match. Looping around the same place, body blocking, all that jazz. It can take away from the fun. Do not get me wrong, I'm not saying "If I don't win, it isn't fair, it's bad and whoever won is bad" no no no. Although I do like winning, who doesn't; I'm not that much of a sore loser. I don't want the survivors to let me win, no real fun in taking candy from a child, I can lose but still have fun - just not when it's made into a... boring game of Piggy in the Middle or whatever, you know? If you win as a Killer, the 'Survivor's book of Killer's Rules' come out and they'll cry bloody tunneling or camping. Or a killer will indeed camp you out of spite. 
- Devs and mod team. Now I have yet to run into any issues regarding bans or anything of the such, however if you take a gander through other reviews you'll find out what I mean. People getting banned for absolutely no reason, "power-mad moderators", ignorant developers - it's all quite shameful but to be honest that is just what I've seen happen to others and not myself. 

Now I've left it until the end of this review to actually click Y/N if I recommend this game. I honestly don't quite know, but of course I already made a choice as you are reading this. So... No. I do not recommend this game, however if, and only if, you are willing to put up with a fair few tons of horsepoop and grasp at slim glimmers of enjoyment in between, feel free to grab the game. And if you get the game, do try to convince some of your friends to get it. It is far more fun, especially messing with Killers or playing private games.

Das Spiel hat verschiedene Modis, zum einen:

- Single-Player (Spiele als Überlebender oder als Killer) --> wo du online mit anderen Spielern zusammen spielst, entweder als Überlebender wo du in eine Lobby joinst oder als Killer eine Lobby erstellst wo dir dann Überlebende joinen.

- Multiplayer (Überlebe mit Freunden) --> spielt man zu viert online als Überlebende

-Multiplayer (Töte deine Freunde) --> spielt man zu fünft mit seinen Freunden, wo einer der Spieler den Killer spielen muss

Anfängerfreundlich ist dieses Spiel nicht unbedingt, außer man nutzt zu Beginn an zum üben den Modus  "Töte deine Freunde". Aber mit den richtigen Leuten jedoch kann es durchaus Spaß machen auch online zu spielen .

Eines muss man sich immer bewusst sein: Es ist ein Online-Spiel, d.h. es gibt mal hier und da einen Bug und man wird immer auf faire und nicht so faire Spieler treffen.
Das Problem mit den Spielern hat man aber nicht wenn man mit dem "Töte deine Freunde" Modus spielt der halt nur mit deinen Freunden wie der Name schon sagt spielbar ist. Aber das hat man nun mal in jedem Online-Game, mit ein bisschen Übung und Geduld ist es auch online super spielbar.

Das schlimmste Problem im Online-Modus sind die Hacker. Zum Beispiel: Speedhacks, Wallhacks. "Ich hab alle Perks gleichhzeitig in Benutzung"-Hack - meiner Meinung nach der größte Minuspunkt. Wenn ihr mal einem solchen Spieler begegnet - BITTE SOFORT MELDEN!

Das Konzept von diesem Spel ist ganz cool. Für meine Verhältnisse ist das Spiel sein Geld wert.

Al principio dudaba en comprarme el juego creo que porque vi más comentarios negativos que buenos, pero nunca me dejo influenciar por la gente puesto que alguien que disfruta de un videojuego tiene buen instinto para escoger lo que juega. Dicho y hecho, solo fueron comentarios de personajes que no quieren dlc o que no puede jugar porque los fps cada vez bajan, no tengo la mejor computadora y lo juego con baja calidad, pero puedo jugar y no me molesta nada en absoluto, mejor aún sabiendo que los asesinos y supervivientes que no podías usar pueden ser comprados en está próxima actualización.

Recomiendo el juego con mis 280 horas de juego :V, porque si o si la pasarás bien sintiendo nervios (no me digan que no), nervios cuando sabes que el asesino está detrás de ti y que en cualquier momento serás presa de su gancho (eso sonó raro), ni que decir si lo juegas entre amigos, diversión y piconería por momentos jeje, pero cuidado podrías perderlos... no solo en el juego o.O

Vorweg: Ja, dieses Spiel hat immer wieder Bugs und die Community ist auch nicht gerade die gesündeste.

ABER: Ich spiele dieses Spiel seit bald 2 Jahren immer wieder gerne, ich kann mich daran nicht satt spielen, egal ob ich Survivor (auch allein mit drei mir unbekannten Spielern / Randoms) oder Killer spiele.

Man kann es zusammen mit drei anderen Freunden online gegen einen fremden Killer oder mit vier anderen Freunden in einer privaten Lobby spielen.
Es gibt viele Charaktere, die man leveln kann, womit der Wiederspielwert sehr hoch ist.
Anfänglich mag es etwas schwer sein, in das Spiel hereinzukommen, aber hat man erstmal angebissen, will man mehr. Mit den baldigen Änderungen, dass charakterspezifische Perks bereits zu Anfang verfügbar sind, und den besseren Tutorials sollte ein Einstieg nicht mehr zu schwierig sein.

Als Letztes etwas ganz Wichtiges zu diesem Spiel: Man sollte es nicht zu ernst nehmen und sich nicht allzu sehr über das Spiel oder seine Spieler aufregen. Man wird immer wieder auf Runden treffen, wo ein Killer nur campt, und es wird Runden geben, wo die Survivor nichts Besseres zu tun haben, als dem Killer das Leben schwer machen zu wollen.
Da für mich aber diese Runden nicht überwiegen, kann ich dieses Spiel nur jedem empfehlen.
(Vielleicht sollte man sich vorher aber noch das ein oder andere YouTube-Video oder einen Stream anschauen, damit man weiß, worauf man sich einlässt ^^)

Love the game been playing it for about a 1 1/2 and I also like the new map with the clown kller.  The only thing I don't like is  how now the killer can close the hatch..  The killer already has a huge advantage over the player with it's perks such as  Barbacue chilli and nurse calling ect..   If  most of your players die early and you have muliple hatches to finish its nearly impossible to finish them without the killer finding you because he already closed the hatch and now knows you cant get out unless you have a key or by chance finish the gen/gens and then you still have to open up the exit gat and get out alive. If this is going to be a permnament thing they may need to have the hatch open after a min or two or even a  hidden lock box with a key that a surivor has to find but only he would be able to find it not the kilelr other wise again the killer would still have the advantage..    If they keep this in the game (The killer closing the hatch)  then I will either play killer mostly or not play as much because of the unfairness to the surivor..    Over All though I love the game ...

게임 해보면서 느낀 장점은 훌륭한 가성비와 DLC들이 저렴하고 몇몇 무료로 풀린 DLC도 좋다는 점
풍부한 컨텐츠와 지속적인 업데이트 그리고 생존자로 살인마를 따돌렸을 때의 짜릿함?
반대로 살인마로 생존자를 조졌을 때 쾌감? 등은 톰과 제리류 게임의 기본요소이니 솔직히 장점조차도 아니고
그냥 현재까지 발매된 톰과 제리류 게임중에 그나마 유저수가 많다는 것
슈바 칭찬 억지로 하기 개빡새네

아니 솔직히 이미 팔만큼 팔았자나 첨에 스트리머들이 방송해서 왕창 팔고
그 기세로 DLC쭉쭉 발매해서 또 팔아치우고 이 정도면 이 게임으로 얻을 원래의 기대 수익보다
몇 천배는 벌었을 걸? 이런 취향타는 매니악 게임으로 메이저 게임만큼 팔았으니 많이 벌었지
만약 이 게임이 오픈 베타 후에 정액제로 정식 서비스 했다면 본전만 뽑았겠지
나도 슈바 혹해서 샀어 그래 나 같은 사람이 몇십만명일 거다 이거 분명 몇십만장 팔았을 걸?
근대 동접자 평균 2만 슈바 장난까나

슈바 20년전 게임 포트리스도 동접자 2만은 되겠다
그리고 큐는 왜캐 안잡혀 잡혀도 핑이 왜 오락가락해
한본섭인거 아냐? 한본섭인데 왜 이래 아니 핑이 이 따위면 옵션에서 조절이라도 가능하게 해주던가
배드핑 유저들을 위한 배려냐? 복지정책이야?
그리고 핑 초록핑 호스트 뜰때까지 개빡새게 리매칭해서 잡히면
왜들 이렇게 쳐나가시나? 나갔다 들어왔다 나갔다 들어왔다
어우 개 인내의 시간끝에 레디 다 박고 고하면 1색이가 쳐 나가있네?

와 슈바 이 게임은 진짜 완벽한 사회체제에 대한 힌트를 제시하는 게임이야
이 게임은 랭크 비랭크가 없어 모든 게임이 다 랭크게임이야
그럼 당연히 저 랭크인 사람이 많아서 저 랭크 큐가 더 빨리 잡혀야 하는 거 아닌가요? 라고 물으면
ㄴㄴ 큰 차이없어 이 게임은 천상계와 지하계가 존재할 때 생길 수 밖에 없는 피라미드 형 구조를
드럼통 형 구조로 바꾼 최초의 혁명적인 게임이야

슈바 진짜 귀중한 체험이었다 나의 50시간
아 진짜 드렁통 형 구조 극혐

Dá muito medo de tentar coisas arriscadas como sobrevivente no começo, vc leva muito cagaço nas primeiras horas jogando contra o Hillbily, Miers, e a Porca. Porém, se torna divertido conforme você vai jogando. O que eu mais gosto em Dead By Daylight é por ter uma temática diferente de todos os jogos que eu já joguei. Vale a pena cada centavo.

nice

Here's the thing. If you want to play as a killer, the game is fun and the devs suck you off. I play plenty of killer and the game gets easier and easier (I know what I said and how.). 
If you want to play a survivor on the other hand, it's iffy. They continue to take away from the survivors, and shame playing "Immersively" (Trying not to be seen heard or anything by the killer. How a survivor should be playing right?)

Essentially, the game is becoming more and more broken. I highly doubt they will fix issues seen, overpowered mechanics, and the other frustrations anyone who once enjoyed playing a survivor have. 

The Devs essentially told players in an interview if you find the game too hard or broken, deal with it, play something else. I get that they love their creation but they are trash really. I loved this game, but the devs have ruined it. Not recommended. Save your money for if and when they fix it.

So, I picked this game up after the free weekend, but I had been looking at this game for a VERY long time. I absolutely love it. There are some balance issues that come up, namely the survivors being at a large advantage. The game has no coms system once you are in the round, and seems to be balanced around this. So if you decide you want to play the Killer and get grouped up against a four man squad using discord, you are basically done for. The most you can hope for is one or two sacrifices if you camp the hook. 

And, on hook camping, sure, it's frustrating, but it is basically just going afk as the killer while the survivors go and each grab a gen. 


A few balance tweaks would make this game perfect, and a forced solo matchmaking ranked queue would be a godsend.
